title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in the Czech Republic 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.
The line drastically increased by 1.8 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 5.31 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 2.45 was reported at Year 2016, and 2019
min_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.

The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
